BodyName: Committee on Mental Health, Developmental Disability, Alcoholism, Substance Abuse and Disability Services
Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Education

Items.Title: Oversight - Addressing the Needs of Students with Dyslexia and Related Language-Based Learning Disabilities.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Addressing the Needs of Students with Dyslexia and Related Language-Based Learning Disabilities.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Education

Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign A.1480/S.2534, legislation regarding the certification or training of teachers, administrators and instructors in the area of dyslexia and related disorders.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: The certification or training of teachers, administrators and instructors in the area of dyslexia and related disorders. (A.1480/S.2534)

Items.Title: Oversight - Addressing the Needs of Students with Dyslexia and Related Language-Based Learning Disabilities.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Addressing the Needs of Students with Dyslexia and Related Language-Based Learning Disabilities.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign A.1480/S.2534, legislation regarding the certification or training of teachers, administrators and instructors in the area of dyslexia and related disorders.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: The certification or training of teachers, administrators and instructors in the area of dyslexia and related disorders. (A.1480/S.2534)
